channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China tells its tech companies they can’t buy AI chips from Nivida
item.description: After strongly discouraging tech companies from buying Nivdia's AI chips in August, the country is now banning the practice outright.

item.title: Tesla is redesigning its door handles following safety probe, Bloomberg investigation
item.description: Chief designer Franz von Holzhausen said Wednesday that the company is "working on" combining the electronic and manual door releases after owners hav...

item.title: Fired CDC Director Says RFK Jr. Pressured Her to Blindly Approve Vaccine Changes
item.description: Susan Monarez told a Senate committee that Robert F. Kennedy Jr. demanded she dismiss career officials without cause—and accept vaccine recommendation...

item.title: Inside Trumpworld’s Reality Distortion Field
item.description: In the immediate aftermath of Charlie Kirk's killing, Donald Trump's advisors were sure who was to blame. That law enforcement says they were wrong di...

item.title: The iPhone Air’s real breakthrough is its battery
item.description: Apple's slimmest iPhone uses a "revolutionary" battery design that allows the cell to fill more space within the device, boosting overall energy stora...

item.title: Big Deals on Big TCL TVs—Some Of Our Top Tested Models Are Nearly 50% Off
item.description: TCL is offering deep discounts across its mini LED range, but our favorites are at the top end.

item.title: The DOGE Subcommittee Hearing on Weather Modification Was a Nest of Conspiracy Theorizing
item.description: A House Oversight Committee hearing produced a flood of bizarre claims about cloud seeding, chemtrails, and solar geoengineering. Proven, human-driven...

item.title: How to Change Your Kindle’s Language: Spanish, French, Japanese, and More (2025)
item.description: Every Kindle works in multiple languages, and can download books in just about any tongue. Here’s how to take advantage.

item.title: Meet Macroscope: an AI tool for understanding your code base, fixing bugs
item.description: On Wednesday, former Twitter head of product Kayvon Beykpour announced the launch of Macroscope, an AI system aimed at developers and product leaders ...

item.title: Kleiner Perkins-backed voice AI startup Keplar aims to replace traditional market research
item.description: The two-year-old startup raised a $3.2 million seed round led by Kleiner Perkins.
